title: Looking for active Mid/Top
body:
We look to play at nights. Active Teamspeak/Skype. Prefer Diamond but plat is fine as long you main the role. Communication is key.

ADC -Diamond 5
Jungle -Plat 4
Sup -Diamond 5
Top -Diamond 5

Add me in 2MuchPepper

replies.body: You might want to mention in the title that the rank you are looking for is Diamond or platinum so that most people don't have to click on this.
